pageProduct.name: Avene Cicalfate Restorative Skin Cream 40ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Restorative cream for sensitive fragile and irritated skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Can be used on open, broken skin and external mucosae. For eternal use only. Avoid contact with the eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Repairing and protecting cream for skin and external mucosae of infants, children and adults. Helps restore the cutaneous barrier, soothes the skin discomfort. Micronized sucralfate facilitates the reparation of the epidermis and the combination of copper sulfate and zinc sulfate reduces the risk of bacterial contamination. Can be used after minor dermatological treatments.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM). HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL. GLYCERIN. ZINC OXIDE. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. POLYGLYCERYL-2 SESQUIISOSTEARATE. PEG-22/DODECYL GLYCOL COPOLYMER. ALUMINUM SUCROSE OCTASULFATE. ALUMINUM STEARATE. BEESWAX (CERA ALBA). COPPER SULFATE. MAGNESIUM STEARATE. MAGNESIUM SULFATE. MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX (CERA MICROCRISTALLINA). WATER (AQUA). ZINC SULFATE.

Directions

Apply once or twice a day on clean, dry skin.
